Projects.Name: Calculator
Projects.Heading: The Calculator project from the free Code Camp Front End Course
List: Supports the 4 basic math operations
Each number only allows for one decimal
Negative Numbers are supported
Both Clear and Delete buttons
Whole numbers cannont start with a 0
Projects.Description: Future ideas are to implement more advanced features such as: exponents, sin, cos, tan, log, ln, etc.

Projects.Name: Quote Generator
Projects.Heading: The Quote Generator project from the free Code Camp Front End Course
List: The quotes come from a JSON file
A new color should appear every time a new quote is generated
The quote author should be displayed

Projects.Name: Pomodore Clock
Projects.Heading: The Pomodore Clock project from the free Code Camp Front End Course
List: Both the session and break time can be incremented and decremented, to as low as 1 minute and to as high as 60
Once the time is over timer should switch from session to break and vice versa
The time should be able to be paused and resumed
Values should be resettable
Once the timer finishes a sound will be played

Projects.Name: Pathfinder
Projects.Heading: Assigment to create a pathfinder for a given 10x10 map
List: Should work on all 10x10 maps (that have a possible path)
Needs to not exceed the maximum  number of steps nor the maximum time limit
Blue Squares (Water) are obstacles the pathfinder must overcome
The Pathfinder cannont go out of the 10x10 area
Projects.Description: The A* algorithm was implemented for this project. The best path is pre-calculated and then executed. The cost to move is always one therefore diagonal movement is also used.

Projects.Name: Slide Creator
Projects.Heading: A tool to create carousel slideshows
List: The carousel can be any needed size
Size can also be changed on demand
Image urls are needed, alt descriptions are recommended
Projects.Description: The output is HTML, with a style and script element, copied directly to the clipboard ease of implementation.

Projects.Name: Flappy Bird Clone
Projects.Heading: A clone of the popular mobile game Flappy Bird made in JS
List: A Scoreboard to keep track of highest scores of the current session

Projects.Name: Twin Cities
Projects.Heading: Assigment to query the given DataBase and return the Twin Cities of each map
List: Twin cities are cities where the average road length is less than or equal 70% of the average road lenght of the given map
Returned is: Map name and Id, number of cities, the average road length and the twin cities with the distance between the pair
Projects.Description: This project is written in Java, with JDBC.

Projects.Name: Drum
List: Each button plays an associated sound
